sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Card,CardContent,Typography,Grid, StylesProvider, withStyles} from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css'; import CountUp from 'react-countup'; import cx from 'classnames'; const Cards = ({data : {confirmed,recovered,deaths,lastUpdate}}) => { if(!confirmed) { return "Loading..."; } return (
Infected {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} No. of active cases Recovered {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} No. of recoveries Deaths {new Date(lastUpdate).toDateString()} No. of deaths
); } export default Cards;
